Headline: Normal Red Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after signal problem at 95th/Dan Ryan. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Red Line trains are running with residual delays after signal problem at 95th/Dan Ryan.

Shuttle buses are available  between 95th/Dan Ryan and 87th/Dan Ryan, and will continue to provide connecting service in both directions.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.
